about_the_game:
Aggregate Core spits you out into a dark and horrific world made by machines that are hell bent on tearing you apart. As your creator sends you out into the vast maze of machinery to fetch and complete various missions, equip yourself with an armory of weapons and abilities purchased from the corporation that owns you or that you managed to extract from before. Exploring the dark mysteries of the world, a story will come to light that will have you dying over and over again to unfold.



Humanity has lost their sense of home as earth is now nothing more than a forgotten legend. Knowing only a world of machines and artificial intelligence, humanity has reverted to extremes in order to survive. The enigmatic computer minds known as the Aggregate are as uncaring and as constant as the forces of nature. They maintain the vast incomprehensible workings of this new world known as The Assembly. A corporate slave is born. A cloned human made from flesh and steel. This cyborg is thrown into an endless cycle of death and rebirth, completing tasks for corporate overlords and being reuploaded to a new body each time it should fail.



The cyborg's creator is a firm believer in having more hands to get a job done faster, thus, he has equipped the cyborg with four arms. This unique mechanic gives players options for their loadouts that most shooters don't have. Equip more guns for higher firepower, or opt for abilities that can improve movement. The choice is yours.



The Aggregate is an enigma to humanity and loves changing the world it has built all the time. This will make every mission a unique experience and players will never quite know what's around the corner. Because of this, players are encouraged to explore to find treasures or secrets that may be rarely constructed.



Not only is everything in The Assembly trying to kill you, but the Aggregate likes to get creative with its machines of death. So, get creative with a variety of weapons and incinerate, dismember, explode or hack your way through these very destructible foes.


A passion project, Aggregate Core is currently in development by two dedicated friends, who love making games just as much as playing them. We hope we can bring something special to the genre of extraction shooters and that you will love this game!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains bloody violence, gore and death.

short_description: A first-person shooter where extraction meets horror. Navigate a procedurally generated maze, experience a liberating story, and fight unspeakable horrors. Escape with the pillages of war or become another victim in this heart-pounding journey.
